verses.verse: O God <WH430>, you are my God <WH410>; early will I seek <WH7836> you <WH5315>: my soul thirsts <WH6770> for you <WH1320>, my flesh longs <WH3642> for you in a dry <WH6723> and thirsty <WH5889> land <WH776>, where no <WH1097> water is <WH4325>;
To see <WH7200> your power <WH5797> and your glory <WH3519>, so as I have seen <WH2372> you in the sanctuary <WH6944>.
Because your lovingkindness <WH2617> is better <WH2896> than life <WH2416>, my lips <WH8193> shall praise you <WH7623>.
Thus will I bless <WH1288> you while I live <WH2416>: I will lift up <WH5375> my hands <WH3709> in your name <WH8034>.
My soul <WH5315> shall be satisfied <WH7646> as with marrow <WH2459> and fatness <WH1880>; and my mouth <WH6310> shall praise <WH1984> you with joyful <WH7445> lips <WH8193>:
When I remember <WH2142> you upon my bed <WH3326>, and meditate <WH1897> on you in the night watches <WH821>.
Because you have been my help <WH5833>, therefore in the shadow <WH6738> of your wings <WH3671> will I rejoice <WH7442>.
My soul <WH5315> follows hard <WH1692> after <WH310> you <WH3225>: your right hand upholds me <WH8551>.
But those that seek <WH1245> my soul <WH5315>, to destroy <WH7722> it <WH935>, shall go into the lower parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>.
They shall fall <WH5064> by the sword <WH3027>: they shall be a portion <WH4521> for foxes <WH7776>.

But the king <WH4428> shall rejoice <WH8055> in God <WH430>; every one that swears <WH7650> by him shall glory <WH1984>: but the mouth <WH6310> of them that speak <WH1696> lies <WH8267> shall be stopped <WH5534>.
